Tap the clock in button to clock in.\nTo clock out tap the clock out button.\n\nThe app will automatically store your time record.\n\n To add a sick day, tap the sick face on the Toolbar. Tap submit when you\'re ready to submit to firebase.\n\n Timesheet activity developed by: Jacob Hessian
Add a sick day: Type a message Add Sick Day yyyy/MM/dd Write a message and send it to your teams discussion board. Click on any post to add a comment to it and view other peoples comments or delete your own. \n\n Discussion activity developed by: Arman Aryanpour Check the frequency of your timestamps for the month, or narrow it down to the day. In put a day, such as 9 in the field and click search. Click toggle to view different formats of graphs. Reporting activity developed by: Arman Aryanpour
